# contrail-external-stunnel parameters

| parameters            | default                                        |
| --------------------- | ---------------------------------------------- |
| **Stunnel**           |                                                |
| REDIS_LISTEN_ADDRESS  |                                                |
| REDIS_NODES           | ANALYTICS_NODES                                |
| REDIS_STUNNEL_PORT    | 6666                                           |
| REDIS_SERVER_PORT     | 6379                                           |
